Package com.example.project1

Class WhackAMoleViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.project1.WhackAMoleViewModel
public class WhackAMoleViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for the Whack-A-Mole game.

  • Field Details

    • score

      private int score
      int for score (+10 for every hit mole).

    • lives

      private int lives
      int for lives (-1 for every missed mole). Start with 3 lives.

    • random

      private final Random random
      Random object to generate random numbers.

    • handler

      private final android.os.Handler handler
      Handler to schedule the next mole pop-up.

    • moleRunnable

      private Runnable moleRunnable
      Runnable to schedule the next mole pop-up.

    • currentMole

      private int currentMole
      int for current mole. -1 means no mole is visible.

    • moleWhacked

      private boolean moleWhacked
      boolean flag to check if mole was whacked.

    • gameEnded

      private boolean gameEnded
      boolean flag to check if the game has ended.

    • difficultyLevel

      private int difficultyLevel
      int for difficulty level. Starts at level 1.

    • moleDelay

      private long moleDelay
      long for mole delay. starts at 1500 or 1.5 seconds

  • Constructor Details

    • WhackAMoleViewModel

      public WhackAMoleViewModel()

  • Method Details

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Get the current score.
      Returns:
      this score

    • getCurrentMole

      public int getCurrentMole()
      Get the current mole.
      Returns:
      this mole

    • getLives

      public int getLives()
      Get the current lives.
      Returns:
      this lives

    • isGameEnded

      public boolean isGameEnded()
      Check if the game has ended.
      Returns:
      this gameEnded

    • hitMole

      public void hitMole()
      Increment the score by 10 if mole is hit. Then increase difficulty and reset current mole to -1.

    • loseLives

      public void loseLives()
      Decrement the lives by 1 if mole is missed. End game if lives = 0.

    • increaseDifficulty

      private void increaseDifficulty()
      Increase the difficulty level and adjust the mole delay.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Start the game by scheduling the first mole pop-up.

    • stopGame

      public void stopGame()
      Stop the game by removing the mole pop-up.

    • endGame

      private void endGame()
      End the game by stopping the mole popping logic.
